long_description: Block the bad rays on a sunny day with the Refraction Hat from Outdoor Research. It's rated an outstanding UPF 50+ for protection from harmful solar exposure, and it's an easy traveler, too. Nylon/polyester fabric offers UPF 50+ SolarShield(TM) protection. Headband and mesh-lined crown wick away moisture and feel soft against your skin. Eyelets throughout crown aid ventilation. Removable chin cord with cordlock holds hat in place on windy days; internal cinch adjusts the fit. Outdoor Research Refraction Hat for men and women features a crushable brim for easy packing. Machine wash cold and line dry. Closeout.
short_description: Block the bad rays on a sunny day with the Refraction Hat from Outdoor Research. It's rated an outstanding UPF 50+ for protection from harmful solar exposure, and it's an easy traveler, too.
